Energon. I posted it was coming out of his mouth and
surrounding him. Then he charged at your char (not
fired a beam). And Hugars on the council. The point
was I've already accepted losing an arm and almost
loosing a leg. You haven't accepted squat and you need
to accept something. Now can we get on with the battle
and do it in a FAIR way this time.
